discussion.p: Should <iterator_concepts&gt and <iterator> be different headers? Probably. It's nice to be able to write constrained templates without pulling in all of <iostream>, for example. On the other hand, which header should things like std::iterator and std::forward_iterator_tag go in? Also, at a higher level, some consistent naming or locating policy should be firmly established so that random number concepts, iterator concepts, and other concepts all are coherent.
